name: Short Life
description: Choose your hero and get to the finish without losing your head :) Avoid obstacles and try to complete the levels with all your body parts.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 1.7Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 90 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Dual Core 2.3Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB Storage: 90 MB available space
